summary.label:
LuxTrust Mobile – carry out your most sensitive online operations directly from your smartphone and without using any hard devices (such as the classic Token or a Scan).

WHAT DOES LUXTRUST MOBILE DO?
LuxTrust Mobile allows you to:
- Securely access our partner websites (banks, e-government, …)
- Confirm and validate online financial transactions
- Sign documents electronically directly 
- Perform various operations on guichet.lu

HOW TO ACTIVATE IT?
If you already are a LuxTrust customer and have your Token or Scan at hand, simply install it and follow the steps indicated in the app. 
If you are not a LuxTrust client and you want to use the app, order your LuxTrust electronic identity on www.luxtrust.lu. 

HOW TO USE IT?
LuxTrust has three main modes:
- App2App: Once set-up in your banking app, LuxTrust Mobile can automatically exchange with it so that you do not need to enter an OTP (one-time password). You just have to confirm or cancel the operation. Please check with your bank how to enable this feature.

- Scan the QR code (mosaic image) when connecting to a website using a desktop or tablet:  You will select LuxTrust mobile instead of the Token for instance. You can then scan the QR code displayed after entering your User ID and Password. The app decrypts the image and generates the OTP (one-time password) you need to insert on the website.

- Receive a Push Notification when accessing to our partners’ website from a desktop, tablet or smartphone. Partners’ websites having this feature enabled will automatically send you a notification asking you to confirm or cancel the specific operation. You can also find it under “Pending transactions”.

OTHER FEATURES
You can activate your LuxTrust Mobile app on a second device (like a tablet) and enable TouchID or FaceID to unlock it, for more convenience.

DO YOU NEED HELP?
If you have any questions or need help, feel free to contact our Helpdesk at +352 24 550 550 or by email at: helpdesk@luxtrust.lu.

SECURITY NOTICE
Before installation and as well as during utilisation, please ensure that your devices (smartphone, tablet, etc.) are appropriately secured and protected. For security reasons, LuxTrust do not accept rooted or jailbroken devices and cannot be held liable in case such devices are used.
To remain protect at all times, do not disclose your security codes, PINs, and passwords to anyone. 
If you suspect that your device or credentials have been compromised, stop using the app and immediately notify LuxTrust by telephone at +352 24 550 550. Our colleagues from Helpdesk will offer you support and guidance. 

ABOUT LUXTRUST
LuxTrust is leading European electronic identity and trust services provider. Certified and acting in compliance with the latest European regulations (eIDAS, PSD2, GDPR, ETSI), LuxTrust delivers digital services related to the identification and authentication (required to equip individuals with a valid electronic identity and to secure access to websites and applications) and the creation and validation of electronic signatures.

Basecamp’s intentionally simple by design. It’s why teams that sometimes leave in search of “more power” end up slamming into the consequences of over-powered software: Complexity. RFID Tag Finder will help you rapidly locate those hard to find tagged items.  It is one of a series of apps designed for ASCII2-compatible, Bluetooth® UHF readers from Technology Solutions (UK) Ltd.

Using responsive, audible, signal-strength feedback and a dynamic graphical signal meter RFID Tag Finder allows you to rapidly sweep large areas and hone in on just the asset you are looking for. Alternatively, configure Tag Finder to only detect when the asset is very nearby - allowing rooms full of cages, boxes and racks to be rapidly and efficiently searched.Using the built-in, default configurations or a fully, user-specified operation, Tag Finder can be optimized for your asset environment.

RFID Tag Finder can be configured for tags encoded using:

∙ SGTIN-96
∙ GRAI-96
∙ ASCII
∙ Hex

To make life even easier all the necessary encoding configuration can be achieved by simply scanning an RFID tag in the desired format.

The target asset identifier can either be entered manually or be scanned from a barcode.
SGTIN-96 encoded assets can be specified using GS1 standard identifiers such as GTIN-8, GTIN-12 (UPC), GTIN-13, GTIN-14 or simply using the Item Reference number.
GRAI-96 encoded assets can be targeted using GRAI codes or plain asset types.

With Hex or ASCII encoding selected a useful, in-built tag scanning screen generates a list of nearby tags, ranked by signal strength to quickly provide a target identifier when demonstrating or familiarising yourself with the operation of the App.


Technology Solutions (UK) Ltd (TSL) specialises in the design, development and manufacture of Radio Frequency Identification Devices (RFID) and other multi-technology mobile device peripherals that are used to track products, assets, data or personnel. RFID devices are typically used in transport logistics, stock inventory control, and collection of personal data and attendance.

RFID Tag Finder uses TSL's sophisticated, parameterised, ASCII protocol which provides developers with a powerful set of commands to carry out complex UHF RFID transponder operations in a simple, easy to grasp way. Using these simple pre-configured ASCII commands, any TSL ASCII2-compatible UHF RFID reader can be rapidly integrated into applications resulting in un-paralleled levels of productivity.

Please note that to explore the full capabilities of RFID Tag Finder requires the TSL 1128 Bluetooth UHF RFID Reader or other TSL ASCII2-compatible UHF reader.

The Faber cable calculator app – the free professional tool.

The Faber cable calculator is an indispensable tool for the day-to-day work of installers and planners. Be it at the building site or in the office: Calculate cable diameters quickly, easily and precisely. All you need is an active internet connection.

What can the Faber cable calculator app do?

The Faber cable calculator app serves to perform simple calculations for dimensioning cable diameters.

Upon entry of the:

- Electric power or rating,
- Cos phi,
- Length/distance

the diameter required for copper and aluminium cables is calculated for the most commonly used cable designs and in consideration of the installation types – in ground (direct, conduit/duct), in buildings (in/on walls, in air, cable conductors, cable trays) – and then directly output as a list with the Faber article numbers. The calculated results are directly linked with the Faber product pages and can be sent to any desired e-mail address.


How does the app work?

After starting the program, enter the basic settings first:
• Nominal voltage
• Maximum permitted voltage drop
  (further guidelines and standards may need to be observed here!)
• Cos phi (power factor)
• Power (in kW) or current (in A) to be conducted
• Cable length

Now you can enter the installation type:

• Direct in ground
• In ground (in conduit / in duct, installation type D)
• Building (in / on wall, installation types A1 to C)
• Building (in air, installation types E to G)

If required, you can also enter a different load factor (0.7 or 1). Specific installation types also provide you with an opportunity to select the number of circuits, the ambiant temperature or the installation gap.

The "Calculate" button serves to list every product from the Faber range that meets the entered requirements. The attendant product page is accessible with a single click. The list of matches can be sent to any desired e-mail address. 

Please note: If the entered conditions fail to yield a plausible result (e.g. excessive power or cable length), an error message will be displayed. In this case, halve the power, for example, in order to simply connect two of the calculated cables in parallel.

Please contact kabelrechner@faberkabel.de with any questions or suggestions you may have, or to report errors.

Disclaimer

The cable calculator app is free of charge. We are unable to accept any liability for the correctness, completeness and topicality of the information contained in the calculator. The data calculated here are based on formulas of our own creation and fixed variables. We accept no liability for the calculated numerical values. We reserve the right to make changes at any time.

We look forward to your review of our app. Thank you!
